nodes.text: A brot was an animal which possessed an internal skeletal structure.

Brots were farmed in order to produce the edible delicacy known as brot-rib. Three opportunistic Squibs trading material to the Killiks during the Swarm War asked Han Solo and Princess Leia Organa Solo to transport crates of brot-rib, in return for assistance finding their daughter Jaina Solo in the Chiss-Killik war zone.
